result.eng: He was a soldier during the war.
result.ga: bhí sé ina shaighdiúir aimsir an chogaidh
result.orig: bhí sé ina shaighdiúir aimsir an chogaidh

result.ponchtml: ḃí sé ina ẛaiġdiúir aimsir an ċogaiḋHe was a soldier during the war.

result.eng: They left the country during the famine.
result.ga: d'fhág siad an tír aimsir an ghorta
result.orig: d'fhág siad an tír aimsir an ghorta
result.html: d'fhág siad an tír aimsir an ghortaThey left the country during the famine.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟág siad an tír aimsir an ġortaThey left the country during the famine.

result.eng: What did you do during your life until now?
result.ga: cad a rinne tú ar feadh do shaoil go dtí seo

result.html: cad a rinne tú ar feadh do shaoil go dtí seoWhat did you do during your life until now?

result.html: i rith na cáscaDuring Easter.
result.ponchtml: i riṫ na cáscaDuring Easter.

result.html: i rith na seachtaineDuring the week.
result.ponchtml: i riṫ na seaċtaineDuring the week.

result.eng: He had many jobs during that time.

result.ponchtml: is iomaí post a ḃí aige i riṫ an amaHe had many jobs during that time.

result.eng: The rain will spread east during the day.
result.ga: leathfaidh an bháisteach soir i rith an lae

result.ponchtml: leaṫfaiḋ an ḃáisteaċ soir i riṫ an laeThe rain will spread east during the day.

result.eng: I play tennis every Friday during the (academic) term.
result.ga: imrím leadóg 'chuile aoine i rith an téarma

result.eng: Spies were being exchanged here during the cold war.
result.ga: bhíothas ag malartú spiairí anseo aimsir an chogaidh fhuair

result.ponchtml: ḃíoṫas ag malartú spiairí anseo aimsir an ċogaiḋ ḟuairSpies were being exchanged here during the cold war.

result.eng: During this employment no money was paid to herself.
result.ga: le linn na fostaíochta seo níor íocadh aon airgead léi féin
result.orig: le linn na fostaíochta seo níor íocadh aon airgead léi féin

result.eng: The Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.
result.ga: d'fhan muintir mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i tulle baile beag i lár na tíre
